name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Data Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-quality data solutions and backend systems, specializing in data transformation and integration for financial platforms. Proficient in **SQL**, **dbt**, and cloud data warehousing with **Snowflake**. Expertise in utilizing **SAP** and **Salesforce** to optimize data workflows and enhance reporting capabilities. Strong skills in **CI/CD** pipelines and version control utilizing **Git**. Committed to delivering data-driven insights with tools like **Power BI** while ensuring thorough **documentation**. Previous accomplishments include developing high-performing APIs and automation tools leveraging technologies such as **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask)** and managing scalable cloud architectures on **AWS** and **Azure**.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized SQL and **Snowflake** for efficient data modeling and processing, optimizing query performance by **30%**.
Developed and maintained documentation for data workflows and processes to ensure clarity and compliance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams integrating **SAP** and **Salesforce** systems to streamline data ingestion and reporting.
Engineered backend services in **Python** using **FastAPI** to support data transformation and ETL processes.
Created data pipelines and automated reporting solutions leveraging **dbt** to enhance analytics capabilities.
Implemented **Git** for version control and adhered to CI-CD practices to facilitate seamless deployment and testing of data solutions.
Designed interactive dashboards and reports using **Power BI** to provide insights and facilitate data-driven decision-making for stakeholders.

• Utilized **SQL** and **Snowflake** to develop robust data models and optimize data pipelines, leading to a **20%** reduction in processing time.
• Employed **dbt** for data transformation to enhance data accuracy and reliability, contributing to improved analytics performance.
• Integrated **Salesforce** data into workflows, facilitating improved data governance and reporting capabilities through **Power BI**, boosting visualization insights by **30%**.
• Implemented CI/CD processes with **Git** to streamline code deployment, resulting in a **15%** increase in deployment frequency.
• Ensured thorough documentation processes for data workflows, enhancing team understanding and support for system changes.
• Collaborated with stakeholders to effectively utilize **SAP** data in analytical frameworks, ensuring comprehensive data coverage and enhanced reporting capabilities.

Utilized **SQL** and **dbt** to model data transformations and manage ETL processes, ensuring efficient data pipeline development and maintenance for analytics.
Developed and integrated data workflows with **Snowflake** for optimized storage and retrieval, supporting business intelligence needs.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including stakeholders using **Salesforce** and **Power BI**, to determine data requirements and ensure alignment with business needs.
Implemented version control practices leveraging **Git**, enhancing collaboration within the development team while maintaining code integrity.
Designed and maintained CI-CD pipelines to automate data integration processes, reducing deployment time by **30%**.
Created thorough documentation to support data models and workflows, facilitating knowledge transfer among team members and ensuring best practices are followed.
Monitored data processes and improved execution times by **25%**, enhancing efficiency in data handling and reporting tasks.
